overview: Capture the magic and excitement of the Walt Disney World Resort in Walt Disney's own words.  Travel behind the scenes in the realization of his dream, the creation of the Walt Disney World Resort. This video adventure offers rare footage of the construction and growth of the Magic Kingdom Park, Epcot, Disney-MGM Studios and Disney's Animal Kingdom Theme Park.  Including a complete tour of Walt Disney Worldâ€™s Magic Kingdom in the words of Walt Himself.
title: Four Parks One World
